mapper.insert: insert into reple values(0, #{boardIdx}, #{content}, #{writer}, sysdate(), 0, 0, 0, 0, "N", #{writerIdx}, null)
mapper.update: update reple set content=#{content}, idDelete=${isDelete} where idx=#{idx}
mapper.select: select * from reple where boardIdx=#{boardIdx} order by groupCode asc, groupSeq asc
mapper.update: update reple set groupCode=#{groupCode}, groupSeq=#{groupSeq}, groupLv=#{groupLv}, parent=#{parent}, parentName=#{parentName} where idx=#{idx}
mapper.select: select max(groupSeq) from reple where groupCode=#{groupCode}
